title: Invite God Into Your Difficulties | Joel Osteen
itunes:title: Invite God Into Your Difficulties | Joel Osteen
description:
If God delivered us out of everything instantly, we would never reach our highest potential. When you invite Him into the storm, He will fill you with His peace and favor. 

Your best days are still ahead, and together we can make a difference in this world with the message of God's hope and love.

To give visit JoelOsteen.com/GiveHope

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
